div.h3: Reviews created for galendea for sprint Gortahork 2
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-4353 Add the algorithm to check the eligibility\'s start date of a leave request
FAB-1988: Updated Absence Reason ADT references.
FDP-4588: Fixed bad reference in the JSP.
FAB-4233: Added service and interface to clone the work calendar.
FAB-4233: Added work calendar cloning when the employment is cloned
FAB-4233: Removed unused widget facade and methods
FAB-4233: Added work calendar null double check
FAB-4416: Placeholder for testing the rule.
FAB-4485: Remove \'Type\' comlumn and add the link in the View/Edit LeaveRequest pages to the parent LeaveRequest
FAB-3812: Renamed method due to updates from FDP
FAB-4626 Copylive Selectors for Doc Types
FAB-1988 exclude copied configurations of webservices from the git repository
FAB-4532: First page showing all the available Absence Reasons to transit To
FAB-4416: Added extend work pattern functionality.
FAB-4416: Updated logic to extend the work pattern
FAB-1988: Change from AbstractAbsenceTestCase to AbstractMockTaTestCase to fix a build fail.
